amendment.description: An amendment to reduce amounts appropriated in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce amounts appropriated in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 275 (Roll no. 524).
